arts.ttl: Chelsea v Ajax, Real Madrid v Juventus, Monaco v Spurs and more: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Champions League goal updates from across Europe ⚽️ Live scoreboard | Send your thoughts to Taha GOALS! REDS! PENS! Tuesday night was hectic in the Champions League, with 43 (!) goals across nine games (Yara deserves a raise). Here’s to more tonight, even if my fingers are left unusable for the next fortnight. We’ve got some juicy fixtures: Real Madrid v Juventus is the heritage pick, while it’s the Eric Dier derby with Spurs’ visit to Monaco (even if he’s injured). Chelsea host Ajax, while Harry Kane’s Bayern Munich welcome Club Brugge. Keep me company for the 44 goals to be scored this evening, with my eyeballs ready to explode as I juggle various screens. Let’s play! Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Ajax live: Blues look to maintain strong form in Champions League clash
arts.sum: The Blues face bottom-of-the-table Ajax in a European encounter they should win

arts.ttl: Jorrel Hato: Should Chelsea fans be worried about €44m summer signing?
arts.sum: Former Chelsea defender Jeffrey Bruma has urged patience with rarely-used summer signing Jorrel Hato, insisting that the Blues 'have a plan' for the Netherlands international. Hato's lack of action in a World Cup season has led to consternation in his native Netherlands, but former Chelsea defender Jeffrey Bruma insists that people need not worry about the teenager.

arts.ttl: How to Watch Chelsea vs. Ajax on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: Chelsea can claim their fourth win in succession when they host a struggling Ajax side.

arts.ttl: Chelsea add 33 players to Champions League squad ahead of Ajax clash
arts.sum: Chelsea have taken the unprecedented step of adding 33 players to their Champions League squad ahead of Wednesday’s clash against Ajax . Among the players added are Thiago Silva’s 16-year-old son Isago and highly rated teens Ryan Kavuma-McQueen, Ibrahim Rabbaj and Shim Mheuka.

arts.ttl: Chelsea bidding to extend 11, 12-game streaks, set unwanted first for Ajax in 36 years
arts.sum: Chelsea will be bidding to extend two streaks and set an unwanted one for Ajax when the two teams meet in Wednesday's Champions League fixture at Stamford Bridge

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Ajax – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Chelsea will be aiming to secure their first home Champions League victory of the season on Wednesday when they welcome a struggling Ajax side to Stamford Bridge. Enzo Maresca’s team bounced back with a win on matchday two but face significant injury problems. Ajax, conversely, arrive in London pointless and goalless after two games, making […] The post Chelsea vs Ajax – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.sum: Chelsea welcome Ajax to Stamford Bridge on Wednesday night for a crucial Champions League fixture. Enzo Maresca’s side need a victory to solidify their position in the group. After recovering from an opening defeat with a vital win at Benfica, they now face opponents on a dreadful run of European form.
